entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
